EmailTemplate.subject: Go touchless at your self-checkouts – here’s how
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> You’re letting in a few customers at a time. Using floor markers to show people how far apart to stand. Now it’s time to check out.
To finish, your shoppers need to touch the payment terminal or the self-checkout screen.
Or do they?
Turns out, there are some pretty simple ways you can transform your checkout into a touchless experience to keep people safer—using the technology you already have. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> In a time of uncertainty, count on NCR.
Our retail solutions experts are in the trenches with our customers, working hard to help provide guidance, solutions and recommendations <[[https://www.ncr.com/coronavirus/retail]]>.
Contact your Account Executive directly to explore options for adding new self-checkout technology or adapting your existing technology to be touchless.
You can also find us at NCR.com/retail <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail]]>, have us call you back <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us?path=https://www.ncr.com/retail]]>, call us in the U.S. at 1-800-CALL-NCR or call outside of the U.S. at 1-937-445-1936.
